channel.title: Porn link shuts health website
channel.description:
[quote=" msn.com"]A council internet forum has been closed after a link to a pornography website was added. Worcestershire County Council said its Healthy Eating Forum, which enabled users to discuss healthy food and lifestyles, had been abused by "childish individuals". The council said such behaviour would not be tolerated. Councillor Stephen Clee, Cabinet member for corporate services at Worcestershire County Council, said: "The Healthy Eating Forum was set up to encourage discussions around attitudes to food and healthy lifestyles. "As is sometimes the case, immature and childish individuals have chosen to abuse the facility. "We will not tolerate this sort of abuse of our systems and have closed down the forum. "If and when the forum reopens, we will have to ensure a different regime is in place to protect users of the facility, and thwart those intent on mischief."[/quote]
sauce: http://tech.uk.msn.com/news/article.aspx?cp-documentID=13762830
Im sorry but one link cannot shut down a whole website, its stupid

item.title: Porn link shuts health website
item.dc:creator: @goatee goatee
item.description:
@goatee wrote:

Lmao didn’t they just think to ip ban the person who did it and delete the post? Not just shut it all down… nooby council peeps.

Read full topic
